item.title: The Roots of Music and Entertainment
item.description: Of course, I don’t mean the roots of music or entertainment in a macro sense, that would be a bit far from the purpose of this project. Rather, I mean the roots of the establishments that provided entertainment to the Rapidians, from then to now. With many established communities, entertainment was the next step in a growing city. As the entertainment sphere changed across America, many of these things were reflected in Grand Rapids.
